column2: University of the West of Scotland
column5: Our MSc in Information Technology course is ideal if you have a degree in a subject other than IT or computing and would like to develop much sought after business-relevant IT knowledge and skills.While a MSc Information Technology student, you will examine:issuestrendscurrent practicestechnological alternativesOur course will equip you with up-to-date technological and business skills, and specialist knowledge to assist your employer in designing and/or implementing appropriate, IT driven solutions in ways that address the needs of modern business organisations.
column7: SCOTTISH & EU £5,500 per year of study  ENGLISH, NORTHERN IRISH & WELSH £7,000 per year of study  CHANNEL ISLAND & ISLE OF MAN £7,000 per year of study  INTERNATIONAL (NON-EU) £13,100 per year of study
